section.title: Service Proposition
section.para: Tracker provides livestock producers and infrastructure providers an effective, low cost solution for managing and exchanging animal premises and event history information.

section.title: Project Goals
section.para:
The Tracker project was undertaken to provide:
A useful service for livestock producers and infrastructure providers.
A low cost solution to enable both large and small scale deployment.
An industry standard for livestock event history inter-exchange.

section.title: Functional Description
section.para: Tracker models animal event histories for farm animal producers and/or livestock infrastructure providers. Animal premises, animals and event histories are created, edited, manipulated, and persisted as model documents. Model documents are displayed and manipulated with Tracker Editors, Wizards, and various Importing and Exporting utilities.
